title: The City of the Dead (restored, colorized) (1960, horror, imdb score: 6.8)

sources.title: The City of the Dead (restored, colorized) (1960, horror, imdb score: 6.8)
sources.description: The City of the Dead (U.S. title: Horror Hotel) is a 1960 supernatural horror film directed by John Llewellyn Moxey and starring Christopher Lee, Venetia Stevenson, Betta St. John, Patricia Jessel and Valentine Dyall. The film marks the directorial debut of Moxey.It was produced in the United Kingdom but set in America, and the British actors were required to speak with North American accents throughout.
